hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT item_id as itemId, COALESCE(effective_power,0) as total FROM dct_items_it WHERE item_id in (:itemIds)

SELECT sum(COALESCE(dct_items_it.effective_power,0)) AS total FROM dct_items item INNER JOIN dct_items cabinet ON item.parent_item_id = cabinet.item_id INNER JOIN dct_items_it ON item.item_id = dct_items_it.item_id WHERE cabinet.item_id = :cabinetId

SELECT cabinet.item_id as itemId, cabinet.item_name As cabinet, trunc(sum(COALESCE(dct_items_it.effective_power,0))/1000.0, 3) AS total FROM dct_items item INNER JOIN dct_items cabinet ON item.parent_item_id = cabinet.item_id INNER JOIN dct_locations ON item.location_id = dct_locations.location_id INNER JOIN dct_items_it ON item.item_id = dct_items_it.item_id WHERE cabinet.class_lks_id = 6 AND dct_locations.code = :locationCode GROUP BY cabinet.item_id, cabinet.item_name ORDER BY 3

SELECT Sum(dct_models.Weight) AS SumOfWeight FROM dct_models INNER JOIN dct_items ON dct_models.model_id = dct_items.model_id WHERE dct_items.parent_item_id = :cabinetId OR dct_items.item_id = :cabinetId AND dct_items.status_lks_id < 305
SELECT COUNT(*) as recCount FROM dct_items WHERE dct_items.parent_item_id = :cabinetId AND dct_items.status_lks_id < 305
